title: 如何给别人warp权限，和地皮插件没办法领，显示permission denied
author: 月之守护

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder essentials.warp
/mangaddp builder plotme.limit.5

分别输入上面两个即可

求最佳

replies.author: 月之守护
replies.txt_content:
qq1812538626 发表于 2015-12-31 13:53
/mangaddp builder essentials.warp
/mangaddp builder plotme.limit.5
不行呢  地皮还是显示permission denied

要在地皮世界领取，给权限plotme.use 输入/plotme auto 
还有这个
注意：需要把plotme.limit.x这条权限给玩家不然玩家可以无限认领格子。
